# The Convergence of Human-Behaviour Prediction  
> Population-scale forecasting in a *No-Guard-Rails* data regime  

![diagram](diagram/behaviour-convergence.svg)

## Files
* `diagram/behaviour-convergence.mmd` – source Mermaid diagram  
* `diagram/behaviour-convergence.svg` – vector (auto-generated)  
* `diagram/behaviour-convergence.png` – hi-res PNG (auto-generated)  

## Usage
1. Edit the `.mmd` file in [Mermaid Live](https://mermaid.live).  
2. CI automatically re-renders SVG & PNG on every push.
